mapper.select: SELECT tc.cart_idx as cart_idx, tc.or_member_id as or_member_id, tc.product_cnt as product_cnt, tc.add_date as add_date, tc.product_idx as product_idx, tp.product_name as product_name, tp.publisher as publisher, tp.author as author, tp.price as price, tp.discount as discount FROM tbl_cart AS tc INNER JOIN tbl_product AS tp ON tc.product_idx = tp.product_idx WHERE or_member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(or_member_id, product_idx, product_cnt) VALUES (#{or_member_id}, #{product_idx}, #{product_cnt})

INSERT INTO tbl_payment (pay_method, pay_price, member_id, name, phone_num, email, receiver_name, receiver_phone_num, receiver_addr, cart_idx, product_idx, product_name, product_cnt) VALUES (#{pay_method}, #{pay_price}, #{member_id}, #{name}, #{phone_num}, #{email}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_phone_num}, #{receiver_addr}, #{cart_idx}, #{product_idx}, #{product_name}, #{product_cnt})

INSERT INTO tbl_delivery (tracking_num, receiver_name, receiver_phone_num, zipcode, receiver_addr, member_id, pay_idx) VALUES (#{tracking_num}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_phone_num}, #{zipcode}, #{receiver_addr}, #{member_id}, #{pay_idx})
mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, content, writer, read_cnt,reg_date, modify_date,reply_state FROM tbl_bbs_qna where writer = #{member_id} ORDER BY idx DESC

SELECT tp.pay_idx as pay_idx ,left(tp.pay_date, 10 ) as pay_date, tp.member_id as member_id, tp.product_cnt, td.delivery_state, tdtracking_num FROM tbl_payment as tp inner join tbl_delivery as td on tp.pay_idx = td.pay_idx where tp.member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY pay_date DESC
